name: Plain Ol' Regular Pong
description:
Plain Ol' Regular Pong was developed as part of a small game jam between July 24th and August 2nd 2021.

Controls
Mouse and Keyboard.
Developer's Specs

  • OS:   Windows 10
  • Processor:    Intel Core i7-7700K CPU
  • Physical Memory (RAM) :   16.0 GB
  • Graphics Card:   NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage:    2 GB available space
